thread.title: Katelyn Dawn
thread.title_full: Exclusive Offer Club reviewed by Katelyn Dawn

author: Katelyn Dawn
title: Katelyn Dawn
text: When I saw the kijiji ad I thought wow, I wonder if this is legit because if it is that is amazing. It was a bit of a leap of faith to pay for software without meeting someone, and being in Winnipeg I was a little worried. But I downloaded the software off of adobe's website with a legit serial number and all the programs worked. I am kind of pinching myself that I have all these programs now and I don't have to make any more payments. Adobe CC is such a rip off - paying like CAD$700 a year indefinitely - so I am very very pleased I have the programs I need as a designer and I can keep what little money I make haha!
